Container.Name: Keyoxide - Proxy
Container.Overview:
Keyoxide is a privacy-friendly tool to create and verify decentralized online identities.
This is the proxy interface. It is recommended to also run a Keyoxide - Web container alongside it.
Container.Requires: Requires a Keyoxide - Web instance to be running alongside this container.

Config.Name: Domain
Config.Description: The domain on which the instance is hosted

Config.Name: ActivityPub - URL
Config.Description: The URL of the simulated ActivityPub account (e.g. https://KEYOXIDE_WEB_DOMAIN/user/keyoxide)

Config.Name: ActivityPub - Private Key
Config.Description: The private key used to simulate an ActivityPub account and sign HTTP requests

Config.Name: IRC Nickname
Config.Description: The nick of your IRC verifier account

Config.Name: Matrix - Access Token
Config.Description: The access token of your Matrix verifier account

Config.Name: Matrix - Instance
Config.Description: The URL of the Matrix instance your verifier account is hosted on

Config.Name: Matrix - Room
Config.Description: The ID of the Matrix room your verifier account will use

Config.Name: Telegram - Token
Config.Description: The bot token of your Telegram verifier bot

Config.Name: XMPP - Service
Config.Description: The hostname of your XMPP verifier account

Config.Name: XMPP - Username
Config.Description: The username of your XMPP verifier account

Config.Name: XMPP - Password
Config.Description: The password of your XMPP verifier account

Config.Name: Act as Web
Config.Description: Disable web interface functionality. Not recommended to change.
